About Me Projects

About me

I am very passionate about JavaScript, its environment and its community. I am a very loyal defender of Open Source and I do my best to collaborate with different Open Source projects whenever I have the time. I have made some contributions to the following repositories, such as AngularJS, Angular Material, npm and Jest.

Moreover, nowadays I am active member of the Node.js Automation Team.

During these first years, I have been focused on learning as much as possible about Frontend development, which is what I wish to dedicate my professional career, as well as user interfaces design, usability and user experience.

Being updated and informed in the most leading JavaScript framework and libraries is my top priority in order to acquire as much knowledge as possible. Therefore, GitHub is a very essential tool for myself.

The management and coordination of projects and teams is a field in which I am very interested as well.

I really enjoy what I do, and that encourages me to keep improving everyday so as to become a better professional.

As far as my personal formation is concerned, I love to dedicate my free time to acquire more knowledge. As a matter of fact, I am doing University Master in Computer Engineering.

Projects

Generic Image Server

Node.js, Express.js, Redis, Imagemagick

Image server implemented with Node.js. The server provides an image and resize it maintaining its aspect ratio. You need to specify a image resolution in order to resize it.
